title: Relationship Theory: On Choosing Not to Have Kids and Dividing House Chores
description: Tom Bilyeu (@tombilyeu) and Lisa Bilyeu (@lisabilyeu) answer questions directly from the Impact Theory community. Topics covered in this relationship Q&A  include:    How to deal with family’s disappointments in your decision not to have kids. Dividing gender roles and house chores in the household when one partner makes more money. Practical tips to rebuild the connection in your relationship when one partner feels distant. How to deal with the potential regret of not having kids. What to do when you disagree on fundamental values in the relationship.
